Adventure Comics [microform] -- New York : National Comics Publications, 1938-1983. -- col. ill. ; 26 cm. -- Began with no. 32 (Nov. 1938). -- Microfilm. St. Clair Shores, Mi. : J. Bails. -- positive ; 16 mm. -- (Jerry Bails Microfilm Library of Comic Art) -- Continues: New Adventure Comics. -- Genre: Superhero. -- LIBRARY HAS: no. 40-380. -- Distribution on reels:

Adventure Comics [microform] -- New York : National Comics Publications, 1938-1983. -- col. ill. ; 26 cm. -- Began with no. 32 (Nov. 1938). -- Continues: New Adventure Comics. -- Microfiche. Midland Park, N.J. : MicroColor International. ; P.J. Iacovone. -- color fiche -- LIBRARY HAS: no. 32-175, 247 (1938-1952, 1958). -- Call no.: PN6728.1.N3A3m

Anthology-style comic book, 1939-1983. Please scroll down for outline contents of some library-held issue. Features in this comic book include:
  • Anchors Aweigh! (issues 32-52)
  • Aquaman (issues 103-117, 119-152, 154, 156, 158, 160, 162, 164, 167-168, 170-206, 208-280, 282, 284)
  • Barry O'Neill (issues 32, 34-60)
  • Bulldog Martin (issue 40)
  • Cal 'n' Alec (issues 32-35)
  • Captain Desmo (issues 32-47)
  • Congorilla (issue 270-281, 283)
  • Cotton Carver (issues 35-37, 39, 41-65)
  • Dale Daring (issues 32-37)
  • Don Coyote (1938-1939)
  • Father of the Submarine (issue 158)
  • Federal Men (issues 32-70)
  • Genius Jones (issues 77-102)
  • Ginger Snap
  • The Golden Dragon (issues 32-36)
  • Green Arrow (issues 103-205, 207-269)
  • A Hall of Fame Classic
  • Hourman (issues 48-83)
  • Inspector Kent of Scotland Yard (issue 38)
  • Jack Woods (issues 39-42)
  • Johnny Quick (issues 103-204, 206-207)
  • The Lucky Ring (issue 33)
  • Manhunter (issues 73-92)
  • Mark Lansing (issues 53-62)
  • Mike Gibbs Guerilla (issues 84-102)
  • Paul Kirk Manhunter (issues 58-72)
  • Professor Dolittle
  • Rusty and His Pals (issues 32-52)
  • The Sandman (issues 40-102)
  • The Shining Knight (issues 66-125, 127-128, 131-132, 137-139, 142-145, 148, 150-151, 153, 155, 157, 159, 161, 163, 165-166)
  • Skip Schuyler (issues 37-46)
  • Socko Strong (issues 40-57)
  • The Spectre
  • Starman (issues 61-102)
  • Steve Conrad, Adventurer (issues 47-76)
  • Steve Malone (issues 38-39)
  • Superboy (issues 103-345)
  • Supergirl (issues 381-427)
  • Tales of the Bizarro World (issues 285-299)
  • Tales of the Legion of Super-Heroes (issues 300-380)
  • This Doggone World (issues 32, 35, 42)
  • Tod Hunter (issues 32-38)
  • Tom Brent (issues 32-39)
  • Tracey Thompson (issues 401-402)
  • Warrior Bold (issue 156)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich.: J. Bails, 1976). Keltner includes issues 32-303.
